trans_title: 爱情岛（美国版） 第六季
introduction: The sixth season of the American version of the television reality program Love Island premiered on June 11, 2024. Islanders include Robert Rausch, who previously appeared on the previous season as a Casa Amor bombshell, Aaron Evans, who won season 1 of The Traitors UK, and Kordell Beckham, who is the younger brother of Odell Beckham Jr..
chinese_title: 爱情岛（美国版） 第六季
